products.title: JBL SB270 Soundbar with Wireless Subwoofer – Black
products.description: Extra Bass. Extraordinary sound. The JBL Cinema SB270 features 220W system power, Dolby Digital, Optical and HDMI ARC, four powerful full range drivers and comes with a wireless subwoofer. Enjoy impressive, balanced sound with extra deep bass for movies and music entertainment. Plus, it’s Bluetooth-enabled so you can play your favorite music wirelessly from any smartphone, tablet or laptop and features a one cable HDMI ARC connection that ensures a hassle-free user experience.

products.title: LG Sound Bar SQC1 2.1ch Audio System
products.description: MANUFACTURER’S DESCRIPTION Enhance the audio of your TV with the LG SQC1 soundbar, an expertly crafted product from TV and audio masters. Featuring LG’s Auto Sound Engine, this 2.1 channel system boasts 160W of total audio output, plus an additional wireless subwoofer for deep-reaching bass. Enjoy easy connectivity to a variety of devices via USB or optical port, or simply stream your favorite tunes with Bluetooth. FEATURES AND DETAILS 2.1 Channel 160W : Equip your TV with a 2.1Channel 160W sound bar and wireless subwoofer for maximum audio quality without compromising on design.
